attributes.title: Horrific
attributes.review: This app is number one in news. why? it has one star and is biased media because its strictly affiliated with trump. not to mention the fact that there is no point to the president having his own app. why does he have one? publicity, because before all else, he is a corrupt business man who just wants attention.

attributes.title: 🧚✨☘️Horrible ✨🧚🌱🐸
attributes.review: This app is terrifying... I got a notification from the app saying that trump was gonna eat my toes, creepy I know THEN it glitched my phone and when it did it made my all of my screen to this video of some gross, orange, fat, ugly, homophobic,rasicst, sexist thing taking a shower, THEN my lights flickered and I saw it, TAHT CREATURE WAS IN MY HOUSE EATING ALL OF MY FOOD GETTING A FREAKING SPRAY TAN, then I deleted the app and that creature was gone... in summary HORRIBE APP

attributes.title: Trash just like this man
attributes.review: I ain’t even sign in the app because I know it’s gonna be trash so what’s the point you know? Anywho if your reading have a good day! Besides if it’s Cheeto head if your reading this I hope your go into a grave 25ft under soon😘✨💖🧚🏽‍♀️and stop being racist but we all know you won’t so please do us a favor and die soon🧚🏽‍♀️❤️✨

attributes.title: very disappointed...
attributes.review: I got this app hoping to be updated whenever women’s/ lgbtqa/ African American/ basic human rights were taken away but all it has is white supremacy merch :( anyways if you were like me then I recommend downloading twitter and following the big Cheeto puff account that way you’ll be notified from the source. -2million stars

attributes.title: Reallly......🥱
attributes.review: This app is so bad I bet trump is the only one to download this app. There is a million ways to describe how terrible, horrific, trash-looking this app is. I don’t know why he made this app, When it said ,”Make America Great Again” oh please look what is going on this year. President Trump, why don’t you eat rocks so we don’t have to listen to your nonsense.....😡

This app is really bad, first of all it is run by A tangerine second of all it will hack into your Samsung fridge and make Alexa play Justin Bieber‘s yummy for three hours long and if you text orange orange orange to the number then you will be punished severely by Trump he will come to your house and will beat you and possibly take you into bed and do some naughty things Plus Donald Trump is racist

attributes.title: Most horrific app!
attributes.review: First and foremost, I was appalled at the sighting of this small handed, orange looking, no lip, senior citizen as soon as I opened the app. After that I figured it was just going down hill so that’s when I decided to leave this review in hope that others could find peace in knowing that I find this app and the old man just as despicable as they do.

attributes.title: Horrible app 🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to be able to keep up with the orange hot Cheeto, but when it downloaded ✨🧚it started glitching and out of nowhere I hear the doorbell ring and open the door 🚪✨🧚😔to discover the orange hot Cheeto man 🤮😭it was a very traumatizing experience and after that I had to go to therapy. So I do not recommend this app unless u want to be traumatized✨😐

attributes.title: just don’t ✨🥰🧚
attributes.review: holy moly what a terrible app! also talk about false advertising! keep America great? FOR WHO?? keep police brutality alive and well?? keep international students from finishing their degrees?? keep cutting environmental regulations so BIPOC communities continue to suffer?? oh no no no! how can we trust this guy who cheated his way into an Ivy League institution to design an app. in conclusion, just don’t do it.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping it could fill me in on what’s happening right now, but when i opened the app I was mortified to see as weird or ahem carrot rapist who wanted to strip the rights of everyone who didn’t support him. This is a horrid app and I am immediately deleting it and I would hope that everyone else does the same. 🤢🤮          👎🏻👎🏼👎🏽👎🏾👎🏿
